channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump wants mass deportations. A ride-along with immigration officers shows the challenges
item.description: Donald Trump has promised to undertake mass deportations. That job would largely fall to the approximately 6,000 federal enforcement and removal officers nationwide.

item.title: Biden signs a bill officially making the bald eagle the national bird of the US
Man arraigned on murder charges in NYC subway death fanned flames with a shirt, prosecutors say
